titleStmt.title: The reward of the wicked preached in a sermon at Linfield in Sussex, and publi[she]d at the request of some welld[is]sed [sic] Christians / by Humphrey Everenden.
titleStmt.author: Everinden, Humphrey.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Iones for Robert Bird, and are to be sold at the signe of the Bible in Cheape-side,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: cropped, stained and tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
